name: The best of the series
reviewBody:
I never care what people say about movies, because the fact is that the most people are too lazy to think for themselves or are afraid not being taken seriously otherwise and just repeat the meaning of other people.

I like the whole series but this is my favorite part, mainly because of the great action sequences. The pod race and the final fight are both brilliant.

My favorite scenes in the Star Wars series are the lightsaber fights, therefore I like the new trilogy much more than the old one.

Darth Maul is the coolest villain in Star Wars ever (way better than the uninteresting Darth Vader).
